item.description:
First, a few more of you chose the Living Green Festival http://www.meetup.com... than the Junior Solar Sprints. There are some excellent presentations there. I urge you to look over their schedule.

Second, I'm sick again. Flu I think. So I'm out.

I suggest you meet Bart and Hiroko and Dhruv et al at the Living Green Festival, perhaps at the Red Sox Green Monster location at 2p (when the fair officially ends), and then walk together to the nearest restaurant/cafe/piza place, which I hope someone will be able to identify.

Sorry I'll miss you again. My efficiency thoughts this week have once again been about some kind of city-wide valet service to reduce the miles of just trying to park, and a re-introduction of very small electric scooters or rail cars throughout the now-emptier streets.

Off to bed now for me.

Cheers,
Josh Dobbelaar, Organizer.
item.how_to_find_us: I won't be there. Got the Flu.
item.name: May'09 AltEnergy Meetup
